author: Staff Reporter
text:
Son also dies, daughter undergoing treatment at Dharmapuri government hospital

A 35-year-old woman allegedly poisoned her two children before consuming herself at Pennagaram on Wednesday. According to police, the victim Kala (35), wife of Maadhayyan (40) had taken a loan of Rs.2 lakh from a self-help group. However, Kala was unable to repay the money.

She told her husband about the loan that was taken without consulting him. Maadhayyan, who was employed in a paper recycle unit in Bengaluru, could not mobilise the money for repaying the loan.

Upset over this, Kala gave cool drink laced with poison to her son Madhan (9) and daughter Sneha (16) before consuming herself.

The three, who were found unconscious in their house by neighbours, were rushed to the Dharmapuri government hospital.

While Madhan died on Wednesday, Kala died on Thursday. Sneha was undergoing treatment. The couple also have 12- year-old daughter.
title: Woman poisons children, ends life
